meanings.definition: A written message or communication within an organization.
meanings.sent1: I received several memos from my boss about the upcoming meeting.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to read the memos from HR regarding the new policies.
meanings.sent3: The memos from the office printer seem to have a mind of their own, always getting lost.
meanings.sent4: The memos fluttered around the office like colorful butterflies, spreading important news.
meanings.sent5: The memos, with their urgent messages, were like little messengers running around the office.

meanings.definition: A brief record or reminder of something.
meanings.sent1: She kept memos of her daily tasks to stay organized.
meanings.sent2: The sticky notes on his desk served as helpful memos for his busy schedule.
meanings.sent3: The memos on the fridge reminded them to buy milk and eggs.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a filing cabinet full of memos, each one a snapshot of a moment.
meanings.sent5: The memos, like tiny flags waving in the wind, marked important details to remember.
